previewPage.bufferHint: This amount is added to help your purchase go through, even if crypto prices shift. This may leave some {{currency}} in your wallet.
previewPage.refundNote: Refunds will be issued in {{currency}} only. The exchange rate and fees change frequently. All crypto purchases are final.
previewPage.feeChangedWarning: The network fee has changed. Please check your total and confirm.
previewPage.pyusdNote: The transaction will be completed using PayPal USD (PYUSD), which is a stablecoin issued and custodied by Paxos Trust Company, LLC. PYUSD runs on the blockchain.

sessionInfo.text: If you have questions, please report this with session ID {{sessionId}}.

exitPage.title: Are you sure you want to exit?
exitPage.subtitle: Your progress will be lost.

doneTransferPage.title: Payment on its way
doneTransferPage.description: You just paid {{amount}}. You'll get a confirmation from {{clientName}} when it's complete.
doneTransferPage.transfersNote: Transfers are not complete until they have received enough network confirmations.

doneTransferDetailsPage.title: What happened
doneTransferDetailsPage.transfersNote: Transfers are not complete until they have received enough network confirmations.

insufficientFunds.title: Insufficient funds
insufficientFunds.subtitle: Your balance is too low to complete this purchase.

connection.title: We're unable to process this payment

payment.title: We're unable to process this payment
payment.subtitle: Your funds will stay in your {{integrationName}} account.

belowNetworkMinimum.title: We're unable to process this payment
belowNetworkMinimum.subtitle: This purchase amount is below your account's minimum exchange limit. Connect another account to complete your purchase.

initialSteps.title: Log in to review payment details
initialSteps.privacyRule: Your info is never stored. Access will end after this payment.
initialSteps.cryptoRule: Use your crypto, review details and approve to pay.
initialSteps.termsText: PayPal processes this merchant's payments. By continuing, you allow Mesh to access your account and transfer crypto to PayPal to pay for your purchase.

connectionPage.approveConnection: Approve the connection request in your wallet

topupPage.title: Top-up needed
topupPage.description: You need more {{targetSymbol}} to complete this purchase. Convert {{convertedSymbols}} to {{targetSymbol}}.
topupPage.balanceNote: If you do not complete the payment, your {{targetSymbol}} balance will remain in your {{integrationName}} account.

loadingScreen.mayTakeFewSeconds: This may take a few seconds

fundingSteps.error: An error has occurred. Please try again
fundingSteps.approval: Approval of your transfer out of {{integrationName}}
